title: Climate Change Study App
description: Developed a study website for students taking Introduction to Climate Change course at Oregon State University.

title: Coffee Roastery Database
description: Developed a database-driven website for a mock company named The Space Cowboys Coffee Connections.

title: Workout App
description: Created a web app to log user exercises with date, weight, and rep details. Utilized a Node.js RESTful API with Express.js for CRUD operations on MongoDB.
